Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒トリオって、どうして 毎回、名前を変えるんだろうネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why is that Dark Trio always changing their name every time we see them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 次は、なんて名乗るか、 予想してみない？
Entry.EnglishText: Wanna try guessing what they're gonna call themselves next?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>なんてどうだ？ ちょいとイカすだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: How about something like the <Blue>Dark Wings<White>? Sounds kinda cool, doesn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「牙」の前は「翼」だったの！ <Tytree>のセンスも、漆黒並だネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Before they were the Fangs, they <Italic>were</Italic> the Wings! Your taste in names is the same as the Dark Trio!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガーン！ お……おれとした事がぁぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Gagh! H-How could you do me like that...
